|brand = Verizon |model = Jetpack |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = MHS291LVW |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = 4G LTE router, mobile hotspot |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = JYCORBIT |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;MDM9615; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29C4G48MAYBAAKS-5 WT; |flash1size = 512 MiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 MiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT29C4G48MAYBAAKS-5 WT; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 2C:30:48, D0:57:85
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = LCD display |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = ''randomly generated'' |defaultssid = Verizon-291LVW-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Verizon-291LVW-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Pantech |manuf_model = MHS291L |manuf_rev = VWQ |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/20/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 300 |upc = 0958923502418 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00GBAO2ES |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00E9WBLGM |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin3 = B00MYL95HM |asin_country3 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Korea
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR6003X;AR6003X-BC2B; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== Additional specifications, per ''Pantech'', follow... *Display: 1.32" OLED screen (128x96 pixel) *Battery capacity: 4040mAh typ., 3900mAh min. *Dimensions (DxWxH): [[Dimensions::0.72" x 2.44" x 3.62"]] *Weight: [[Weight::4.97 oz]]
===FCC info=== Per the FCC photos... *''Micron'' MT29C4G48MAYBAAKS-5 WT (''FBGA'' code: JW739) :NAND + LPDRAM MCP chip ([http://www.elnec.com/device/Micron/MT29C4G48MAYBAAKS-x+WT+%5BTFBGA137%5D/ 4Gbit Flash, 2Gbit RAM]) *The Wi-Fi IC is an ''[[Atheros]]'' AR6003 (AR6003X) :The exact P/N ''appears'' to be AR6003X-BC2B :It is using an additional ''SiGe'' RF IC
*The device is also using the following.. :''[[Avago]]'' ACPM-7251 Multi-band (Cellular) PA module *Battery: ''Pantech'' BTR291B (Li-ion, 3.8V, 4040/3900mAh, 15.4/14.8Wh) :Cell manuf. in China, unit manuf. in Korea by ''Pantech'' ([https://www.amazon.com/Pantech-Jetpack-BTR291B-Battery-Original/dp/B00MYL95HM B00MYL95HM])
The default SSID format stated is ''Verizon-291LVW-XXXX Secure''.. :however, there are now hits for this SSID format in '''WiGLE'''<small> ''Verizon-291LVW-XXXX'' (''XXXX'' = last four [upper-case] hex digits of the BSSID) does :seem to be used (and it is shown as the proper SSID in the final [released] manual)</small> OUIs used for the device are per '''WiGLE''' data for the ''Verizon-291LVW-XXXX''..
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.pantechusa.com/modems/jetpack-4g-lte-mobile-hotspot/ Product page] (''Pantech'') {{•}} [https://www.verizonwireless.com/support/jetpack-4g-lte-mobile-hotspot-mhs291l/ Support page] (''Verizon'')
===Reviews=== *[https://mobitech.com.ua/reviews/obzor-mobilnogo-3g-routera-pantech-mhs291lvw ''Pantech MHS291L'' on '''MobiTech'''] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] MDM9615 ([https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2011/02/14/qualcomm-introduces-28nm-mass-market-ltedc-hspa-chipsets-mobile-broadband PR]) :Wi-Fi: 802.11a/b/g/n (2.4/5GHz) :CDMA (1x EV-DO Rev.A): 800/1900 MHz :GSM/GPRS/EDGE: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz :UMTS/WCDMA: 850/1900/2100 MHz :LTE: 700/AWS 1700/2100 MHz
==See also== :[https://www.verizonwireless.com/internet-devices/verizon/ Verizon Internet Devices] *[[Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot (AC791LVWQ)]] • [https://www.verizonwireless.com/internet-devices/verizon-jetpack-4g-lte-mobile-hotspot-ac791l/ PPage] *[[Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot MiFi (7730L)]] • [https://www.verizonwireless.com/internet-devices/verizon-jetpack-mifi-7730l/ PPage] *[[Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot MiFi (6620L)]] • [http://www.serviceslist.uk/CustomerServiceVerizon/verizon-jetpack-customer-service MDM9625] *[[Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot MiFi (5510L)]] • *[[Verizon Jetpack 4G LTE Mobile Hotspot MiFi (4620L)]] •
